Class IOManagerImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.paimon.disk.IOManagerImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AutoCloseable, IOManager

    public class IOManagerImpl
extends Object
implements IOManager
    The facade for the provided I/O manager services.
